ComicInfo.Summary: Spawn has just escaped the vile tortures of The Curse. His suit has propelled him into a shelter, where he may heal. However while spawn is healing he meets a small boy, who's constantly being bullied. The two go through a long conversation where spawn learns a little bit out his origins from this comic obsessed child. Eventually the kid's bullies show up to finish what they started . . . until Spawn interferes.
ComicInfo.Title: Fanboy
